about_the_game:
【The prince and eight godesses' journey around the world】

Era and Orb, the source of the world's power, has seized by the empire that seeks to upset the world's balance.
Meanwhile, wanting to dominate the world, the empire also attacked the divine kingdom Asira.
With his kindom left in ruins, Wolf, the prince of Asira, embarks on a journey around the world where he teams up with eight heroines and tries to stop the empire's ambition.
Join us in this action RPG where you cultivate relationships with the heroines who each have thier own unique stories!



【 Fast paced, exhilirating combat experience】

The control is divided into regular attacks and special skills,. The design of the combat system allows you to enjoy exciting, fast paced battles.
In addtion to our main protagonist Wolf, players can also switch to his heroines companions.
Make the most out of each classes unique features and strategize with your favorite characters in this game.

【Bond and adventure with the eight heroines—everyone comes with their own voice acting! 】

・Elyonora, a sorceress and a child hood friend of Wolf. (CV: Mizuno Nanami)
・Katoriya, the silver-haired female knight. (CV:Hiiragi Nana)
・Cindy, the lustful squinted-eyed nun. (CV: Misonō Mei)
・Julia, the tanned wild jungle warrior. (CV:Teduka Ryoko)
・Chrissy, a Trap. (CV:Aoi Haru)
・Serenou, the sage with overflowing materanal instincts. (CV: Mozono Kaoru)
・Mimi, the lively big sister wearing a cow-print bikini. (CV:Himari)
・Eve, the lewd that needs punishment. (CV: Anzu Mistsu)

【Rich Hentai Scenes】

This game does not include NTR elements and belongs to the harem genre.
(There are also acitons forced upon our main protagonist)
Plays with toys, group sex, milking, creampie, etc... There are definitely characters that can directly satisfy your sexual desires.

【Example of Hentai Scenes】

*No mosaics in the full game.

・ Descretly having public sex with the childhood friend soceress.

・ A proud female knight, tasting the forbidden fruit for the first time, is forced into performing breast sex.

・A sexy big sister wearing a bikini sits on your face while a wild big sister rides you viciously.

・Three godesses simultaneously penetrated and fingered until reaching climax together

【A game design for easy and enjoyable gameplay】

・Travel efficiently through crystals.
・ Grant your team supporting buffs by collecting items, unlocking facilities, etc
・ All event scenes can be collected in a single round of gameply.

【 Basic information】

・32 CGs (224 if including differences.)
・Estimated play time : 8~20 hours

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 20.
Content Warning! This game contains: violent content, sex acts and sexual assault.

name: Radiant Victorias Demo
